headline: Analysts Are Bullish on ServiceNow (NOW) – Here’s Why
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the best strong buy growth stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On January 14, Evercore ISI reiterated a Buy rating on ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) with a price target of $225. The same day, Oppenheimer also maintained a bullish outlook on the stock, maintaining a Buy rating with a […]

thumbnail.caption: ServiceNow, Inc. (NOW) Is Competing With The Rise Of AI, Says Jim Cramer

headline: Is ServiceNow (NOW) Turning Biometric Security Into Its Next AI Workflow Moat?
summary: In January 2026, authID announced an integration with ServiceNow to bring secure biometric identity verification into more than 8,400 ServiceNow-powered contact centers, including a large majority of Fortune 500 users, with audit-ready logs embedded directly in the platform. This move deepens ServiceNow’s role at the heart of mission-critical workflows by tying its AI and automation capabilities more tightly to fraud prevention and high-risk transaction security. Next, we’ll examine how this...
